OFFICIAL: Bernardo Silva has signed a new contract with Manchester City, keeping him at the Club until the summer of 2026

Football Emily · 24/08/2023 · Man City

﻿As he signed a new one-year contract extension today, Bernardo Silva gushed about his trophy-laden time at City, saying: "It's been a dream."

Bernardo Silva extends his contract

After signing his new deal, playmaker Bernardo took some time to look back fondly on his six years spent playing with the Sky Blues and insisted that nothing could have gone more smoothly.

However, he acknowledged that he is looking forward to the future as he seeks further honors to add to the amazing 14 that he has already amassed.
